title: PES Lateral Entry Anyone
content:
I got a seat through PESSAT at rr campus cse normal one
I'm trying to get a same seat in pes rr campus cs through DCET it will reduce my fees from 4 lakhs to 1 lakh

My main reason to join any college is for it's placements 

Are lateral entry students given same placements as others If so 
do companies have any criteria that only 12th students can take part in placement 

or should I try other colleges cse such as RVCE , BMSCE, MSRIT .

comments.body:
I would not recommend this. 

While although lateral entry students are also treated the same, they also will need to cover up portions for prerequisite courses in first year that others had, once they join in 2nd year.

Do you not have a seat at any college?
Wait what are we supposed to do? I have no college currently pessat rank 1201

It's just that I have covered my 3rd and 4th sem portions in my diploma the only problem I'll have is with maths
I'm just scared that I'll not have same opportunities as others

Diploma students join the classes from 3rd sem onwards , they have extra workload (they need to take up certain courses from 1st sem and 2nd sem ). Regarding placements there is no discrimination between diploma and normal students .

What would you recommend for me
I still have my cet to write
which college is better for my situation
